name: Fierce Fighters ProtoType1
description: Fierce Fighters is a samurai game that is under development. In addition, this is prototype 2. Compared to prototype 1. Prototype 1 has infinite jumping, and no camera follow. Prototype 2 has jumping,wall jump, go throughs platforms (Only if they are standing on a movable platform they can choose to drop down), camera follows but shakes like crazy.
